sect1.title: regex_replace
sect1.para:
A regular expression search and replace on a variable. Use the
preg_replace() syntax from the PHP manual.

note.para: Although Smarty supplies this regex convenience modifier, it is usually better to apply regular expressions in PHP, either via custom functions or modifiers. Regular expressions are considered application code and are not part of presentation logic.

row.entry: This is the regular expression to be replaced.
This is the string of text to replace with.
